title: Hoops Tonight - Reaction to Lakers-Jazz-Knicks trade rumors + Top 25 Players in the NBA: Ja Morant, Dame Lillard & Paul George on brink of top 10
itunes:title: Hoops Tonight - Reaction to Lakers-Jazz-Knicks trade rumors + Top 25 Players in the NBA: Ja Morant, Dame Lillard & Paul George on brink of top 10
description:
Jason Timpf reacts to rumors of a Lakers-Jazz-Knicks three team trade and shares which players the Lakers should target in a potential deal to best help LeBron James and Anthony Davis win a championship. plus Jason ranks players 15-11 of his Top 25 Players in the NBA featuring young stars like Ja Morant, Brandon Ingram, and Devin Booker as well as superstar veterans like Damian Lillard and Paul George. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
